医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
急性肾损伤中巨噬细胞功能的新见解急性肾损伤（AKI）与预后不良相关，迄今为止尚未建立有效的治疗方法。了解预防 AKI 进展的机制至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/New-insights-into-macrophage-function-in-acute-kidney-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/New-insights-into-macrophage-function-in-acute-kidney-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62122e41-5a3a-4437-acdd-067f5c445015 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 14:20:00 -0400 New insights into macrophage function in acute kidney injury
新立场声明强调紧急情况下母乳喂养的重要性母乳喂养医学会 (ABM) 发布了一份开创性的立场声明，提供了有关在紧急情况下保护、促进和支持母乳喂养的全面的全球建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/New-position-statement-highlights-importance-of-breastfeeding-in-emergcies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/New-position-statement-highlights-importance-of-breastfeeding-in-emergcies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5eba6f0c-27ed-4c92-af17-a2b8a2eeeb69 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 14:12:55 -0400 New position statement highlights importance of breastfeeding in emergencies
女孩的身高增长在月经后表现出意想不到的巨大变化女孩在第一次月经后的身高增长出现了意想不到的巨大差异。每两个女孩的身高都会比标准身高 6 至 8 厘米高或短。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Height-growth-in-girls-shows-unexpectedly-wide-variation-post-menstruation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Height-growth-in-girls-shows-unexpectedly-wide-variation-post-menstruation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9b278c5-d1eb-4cdd-b5df-c818ce5918ee Fri, 27 Sep 2024 13:12:00 -0400 Height growth in girls shows unexpectedly wide variation post menstruation
联合国宣言解决抗生素污染和耐药性问题2007年，瑞典哥德堡大学的研究人员发表了一系列研究中的第一项研究，显示印度制药厂的抗生素造成了大规模污染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/UN-declaration-addresses-antibiotic-pollution-and-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/UN-declaration-addresses-antibiotic-pollution-and-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ebc5ac6-997c-49fc-9961-49593fdb1061 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 13:04:40 -0400 UN declaration addresses antibiotic pollution and resistance
研究强调儿童意外摄入急救护理中的不平等跌倒、溺水和中毒等意外伤害是 1-4 岁患者死亡的主要原因，其中很大一部分死亡与意外摄入有关，例如吞咽药物或毒药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-highlights-inequities-in-emergency-care-for-unintentional-ingestions-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-highlights-inequities-in-emergency-care-for-unintentional-ingestions-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40ad2c0e-0e53-4fc6-a7a3-ab19950ad383 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 12:55:59 -0400 Study highlights inequities in emergency care for unintentional ingestions in children
FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific 将来自 FUJIFILM Wako Chemicals USA 的关键产品添加到其生命科学产品组合中FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific 的扩张包括实验室自动化和化学品，简化了全球研究人员获取基本生命科学产品的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/FUJIFILM-Irvine-Scientific-adds-key-products-to-its-Life-Sciences-portfolio-from-FUJIFILM-Wako-Chemicals-USA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/FUJIFILM-Irvine-Scientific-adds-key-products-to-its-Life-Sciences-portfolio-from-FUJIFILM-Wako-Chemicals-USA.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0525d041-a5b8-474e-9c0b-978e4fc48b2f Fri, 27 Sep 2024 09:30:00 -0400 FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific adds key products to its Life Sciences portfolio from FUJIFILM Wako Chemicals U.S.A.
推出具有重复分配功能的 PIPETBOY GENIUS 血清移液器控制器使用 PIPETBOY GENIUS 增强您的实验室工作流程，该产品专为可靠的血清学移液而设计，具有可调节的速度和用户友好的界面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Introducing-the-PIPETBOY-GENIUS-serological-pipet-controller-with-repeat-dispense-capability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Introducing-the-PIPETBOY-GENIUS-serological-pipet-controller-with-repeat-dispense-capability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81d036d1-121b-4d1f-986e-11cfd615214e Fri, 27 Sep 2024 09:25:00 -0400 Introducing the PIPETBOY GENIUS serological pipet controller with repeat dispense capability
Genolier 创新中心开业，成为欧洲领先的研究和创新中心Genolier 创新中心位于 BioAlps 健康谷，促进健康科学领域的合作，旨在重新定义医疗标准和患者护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Genolier-Innovation-Hub-opens-as-a-leading-center-for-research-and-innovation-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Genolier-Innovation-Hub-opens-as-a-leading-center-for-research-and-innovation-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bbadd65-b214-4ffc-a621-4ec1b615a3f0 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 09:20:00 -0400 Genolier Innovation Hub opens as a leading center for research and innovation in Europe
“治疗自然发生的疾病”，创始人诺埃尔·菲茨帕特里克教授解释人类信托倡导研究动物自然发生的疾病，以推进人类和动物的癌症和骨关节炎治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Treating-Naturally-Occurring-Diseasee28099-explained-by-Founder-Professor-Noel-Fitzpatrick.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Treating-Naturally-Occurring-Diseasee28099-explained-by-Founder-Professor-Noel-Fitzpatrick.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60c00a1d-f952-440a-973c-4fe3b9506219 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 09:08:00 -0400 'Treating Naturally Occurring Disease’, explained by Founder, Professor Noel Fitzpatrick
研究表明 MMR 疫苗的有效性随着时间的推移逐渐减弱根据英国的一项模型研究，MMR 疫苗仍然是预防麻疹的最佳保护措施，该研究表明保护水平随着时间的推移略有下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-shows-gradual-waning-of-MMR-vaccine- effectiveness-over-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-shows-gradual-waning-of-MMR-vaccine- effectiveness-over-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32bb4f14-ea29-40cc-9ec7-82263568918f Fri, 27 Sep 2024 08:51:58 -0400 Study shows gradual waning of MMR vaccine effectiveness over time
